82994.summary: Some customers in the Upper Lonsdale area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82994.title: Sept 12 - North Vancouver (Upper Lonsdale) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
